attributes.action: force Halifax Bank to treat its Easycash Customers (Basic Bank Account) the same as everyone else.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently Halifax Easycash customers do not get the same level as service as other customers. We are not allowed to use the counter service, we are not allowed in-branch help. This is a type of financial discrimination and will no longer be tolerated. 

The Easycash account is a basic bank account for people who either need or want basic bank function.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
